title: Kim Kardashian Was Shooting a Sex Tape in the Bambiland When She Confessed to Jessica Alba: "I Want to Write a Play About Hairy Bambilla Inside a Pleasuredome"
description: Probably this is the strangest book you have ever opened in your life. This is something between a novel, a play, and contemporary art. Somebody calls it is abstract literature but it's just a part of the answer. You don't have to read the entire book - feel it, experience it, and taste it like no other book. The book is written in the style of Nigel Tomm's novel The Blah Story and, probably, it will blah your blah out of your mind.
author: Nigel Tomm
